message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $999000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's exceptional quality and rarity.
I'm very interested in the product, but $999000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $900000 is a significant amount, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $950000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $930000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident that it's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
